mapper.insert: INSERT INTO imsure_users (user_id, email, password) VALUES ((SELECT user_id_function FROM dual), #{email}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT users.user_id "userId", email, password, regdate, authority FROM imsure_users users left outer join imsure_users_roles ROLES ON users.user_id = ROLES.user_id WHERE users.email = #{email} AND users.password = #{password}
